worstlesion_unmatched.qsel: SELECT tblMCP.id_vessel_study, tblMCP.mass_lv_g, tblMCP.mass_mcp_g, tblMCP.mass_mcp_perc, tblConfirmPerLesion.lesion_worst, tblConfirmPerLesion.mi_type, tblConfirmPerLesion.mi_event, tblMCP.id_main_vessel FROM (tblConfirmPerLesion INNER JOIN tblConfirmCONFIRM ON tblConfirmPerLesion.confirm_idc = tblConfirmCONFIRM.[﻿confirm_idc]) INNER JOIN tblMCP ON tblConfirmPerLesion.lesion_id = tblMCP.id_vessel_study GROUP BY tblMCP.id_vessel_study, tblMCP.mass_lv_g, tblMCP.mass_mcp_g, tblMCP.mass_mcp_perc, tblConfirmPerLesion.lesion_worst, tblConfirmPerLesion.mi_type, tblConfirmPerLesion.mi_event, tblMCP.id_vessel, tblMCP.id_vtree, tblMCP.id_main_vessel HAVING (((tblConfirmPerLesion.lesion_worst)=1) AND ((tblMCP.id_vessel) Like '%dist%') AND ((tblMCP.id_vtree)='sub'));

total_maar_unmatched.qsel: SELECT tblConfirmCONFIRM.confirm_idc_str, tblMCP.mass_lv_g, Sum(tblMCP.mass_mcp_g) AS SumOfmass_mcp_g, Sum(tblMCP.mass_mcp_perc) AS SumOfmass_mcp_perc, tblConfirmPerLesion.mi_type, tblConfirmPerLesion.mi_event, Count(tblMCP.id_vessel_study) AS CountOfid_vessel_study FROM (tblConfirmPerLesion INNER JOIN tblConfirmCONFIRM ON tblConfirmPerLesion.confirm_idc = tblConfirmCONFIRM.[﻿confirm_idc]) INNER JOIN tblMCP ON tblConfirmPerLesion.lesion_id = tblMCP.id_vessel_study WHERE (((tblMCP.id_vessel) Like '%dist%') AND ((tblMCP.id_vtree)='sub')) GROUP BY tblConfirmCONFIRM.confirm_idc_str, tblMCP.mass_lv_g, tblConfirmPerLesion.mi_type, tblConfirmPerLesion.mi_event;
